title: Authme插件装上服务器无限重启
author: 君临工作室
txt_content:
Authme 5.3.2版本 装上服务端后无限重启提示
[19:39:33] [Server thread/INFO]: [AuthMe] Enabling AuthMe v5.3.2-b1726
[19:39:33] [Server thread/WARN]: [AuthMe] Aborting initialization of AuthMe: [NoClassDefFoundError]: javax/annotation/PostConstruct
[19:39:33] [Server thread/WARN]: [AuthMe] THE SERVER IS GOING TO SHUT DOWN AS DEFINED IN THE CONFIGURATION!
[19:39:33] [Server thread/INFO]: [AuthMe] Waiting for 0 tasks to finish
[19:39:33] [Server thread/INFO]: [AuthMe] AuthMe 5.3.2-b1726 disabled!
[19:39:33] [Server thread/INFO]: Server permissions file permissions.yml is empty, ignoring it
[19:39:33] [Server thread/INFO]: Done (3.539s)! For help, type "help" or "?"
[19:39:33] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping server复制代码服务端核心 spigot 1.8.8 开服使用的是UTF-8码开服

replies.author: schorsch
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 schorsch 于 2018-9-9 14:43 编辑 

使用新版本的authme试试看
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-442729-1-1.html
spigot的链接
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/authmereloaded.6269/

replies.author: 向文
replies.txt_content: 使用fastlogin吧 貌似兼容authme的数据格式

replies.author: TRCRedstoner
replies.txt_content: 试着升级一下插件的版本，或者删除配置文件夹

replies.author: 游侠崔斯特
replies.txt_content: 权限文件那些都缺失 更新版本再重启

replies.author: lizhuang
replies.txt_content: 对应版本的authme没对？可能需要低版本
你先看看你的插件有没有加载出文件夹，如果是插件损坏，更换插件
